Burning Blood.effect: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

Cracked Core.effect: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning.

Pure Water.effect: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle into your hand.

Ring of the Snake.effect: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

Akabeko.effect: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.

Ancient Tea Set.effect: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with [E] [E].

Art of War.effect: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an additional [E] next turn.

Bag of Marbles.effect: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Bag of Preparation.effect: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

Blood Vial.effect: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

Centennial Puzzle.effect: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

Ceramic Fish.effect: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.

Damaru.effect: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.

Dream Catcher.effect: Whenever you Rest, you may add a card into your deck.

Juzu Bracelet.effect: Normal enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.

Lantern.effect: Start each combat with an additional [E].

Maw Bank.effect: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works when you spend any Gold at a shop.

Meal Ticket.effect: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.

Nunchaku.effect: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain [E].

Omamori.effect: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.

Orichalcum.effect: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.

Pen Nib.effect: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

Preserved Insect.effect: Enemies in Elite combats have 25% less HP.

Red Skull.effect: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.

Regal Pillow.effect: Whenever you Rest, heal an additional 15 HP.

Smiling Mask.effect: The Merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.

Snecko Skull.effect: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.

Strawberry.effect: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7.

The Boot.effect: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked attack damage, increase it to 5.

Tiny Chest.effect: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.

Toy Ornithopter.effect: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.

Blue Candle.effect: Unplayable Curse cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Curse, lose 1 HP and Exhaust it.

Bottled Flame.effect: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

Bottled Lightning.effect: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

Bottled Tornado.effect: Upon pickup, choose a Power card. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

Darkstone Periapt.effect: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.

Duality.effect: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity.

Eternal Feather.effect: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

Frozen Egg.effect: Whenever you add a Power card into your deck, Upgrade it.

Gold-Plated Cables.effect: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time.

Gremlin Horn.effect: Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

Horn Cleat.effect: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block.

Ink Bottle.effect: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.

Kunai.effect: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

Letter Opener.effect: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

Matryoshka.effect: The next 2 non-Boss chests you open contain 2 Relics.

Meat on the Bone.effect: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

Mercury Hourglass.effect: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

Molten Egg.effect: Whenever you add an Attack into your deck, Upgrade it.

Mummified Hand.effect: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn.

Ninja Scroll.effect: At the start of each combat, add 3 Shivs into your hand.

Ornamental Fan.effect: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

Pantograph.effect: At the start of Boss combats, heal 25 HP.

Paper Krane.effect: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.

Paper Phrog.effect: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

Pear.effect: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.

Question Card.effect: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.

Self-Forming Clay.effect: Whenever you lose HP, gain 3 Block next turn.

Shuriken.effect: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

Singing Bowl.effect: When adding cards into your deck, you may raise your Max HP by 2 instead.

Sundial.effect: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain [E] [E].

Symbiotic Virus.effect: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark.

The Courier.effect: The Merchant restocks cards, relics, and potions. All prices are reduced by 20%.

Toxic Egg.effect: Whenever you add a Skill into your deck, Upgrade it.

White Beast Statue.effect: Potions always appear in combat rewards.

Bird-Faced Urn.effect: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.

Calipers.effect: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.

Captain's Wheel.effect: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.

Champion Belt.effect: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, apply 1 Weak.

Charon's Ashes.effect: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

Cloak Clasp.effect: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.

Dead Branch.effect: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card into your hand.

Du-Vu Doll.effect: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 Strength.

Emotion Chip.effect: If you lost HP during the previous turn, trigger the passive ability of all Orbs at the start of your turn.

Fossilized Helix.effect: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat.

Gambling Chip.effect: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

Ginger.effect: You can no longer become Weakened.

Girya.effect: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).

Golden Eye.effect: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards.

Ice Cream.effect: Energy is now conserved between turns.

Lizard Tail.effect: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

Magic Flower.effect: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.

Mango.effect: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14.

Peace Pipe.effect: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.

Pocketwatch.effect: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.

Prayer Wheel.effect: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.

Shovel.effect: You can now Dig for relics at Rest Sites.

Stone Calendar.effect: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.

The Specimen.effect: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.

Thread and Needle.effect: Start each combat with 4 Plated Armor.

Tingsha.effect: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

Torii.effect: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 1.

Tough Bandages.effect: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.

Tungsten Rod.effect: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.

Turnip.effect: You can no longer become Frail.

Unceasing Top.effect: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

Wing Boots.effect: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.

Astrolabe.effect: Upon pickup, Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.

Black Blood.effect: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

Black Star.effect: Elites drop an additional relic when defeated.

Busted Crown.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future card rewards have 2 less cards to choose from.

Calling Bell.effect: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics.

Coffee Dripper.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites.

Cursed Key.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain a Curse.

Ectoplasm.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer gain Gold.

Empty Cage.effect: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.

Frozen Core.effect: Replaces Cracked Core. If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost.

Fusion Hammer.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.

Holy Water.effect: Replaces Pure Water. At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles into your hand.

Hovering Kite.effect: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain [E].

Mark of Pain.effect: Gain [R] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.

Nuclear Battery.effect: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.

Pandora's Box.effect: Upon pickup, Transform all Strike and Defend cards.

Philosopher's Stone.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. ALL enemies start combat with 1 Strength.

Ring of the Serpent.effect: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

Runic Cube.effect: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

Runic Dome.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer see enemy intents.

Runic Pyramid.effect: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.

Slaver's Collar.effect: During Boss and Elite combats, gain [E] at the start of your turn.

Snecko Eye.effect: At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused.

Sozu.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer obtain potions.

Tiny House.effect: Upon pickup, obtain 1 potion. Gain 50 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 random card.

Velvet Choker.effect: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

Violet Lotus.effect: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional [E].

Wrist Blade.effect: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.

Brimstone.effect: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.

Chemical X.effect: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by 2.

Dolly's Mirror.effect: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.

Frozen Eye.effect: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.

Hand Drill.effect: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

Lee's Waffle.effect: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.

Medical Kit.effect: Unplayable Status cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Status card, Exhaust it.

Melange.effect: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3.

Orange Pellets.effect: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.

Orrery.effect: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

Prismatic Shard.effect: Combat reward screens now contain Colorless cards and cards from other colors.

Runic Capacitor.effect: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.

Sling of Courage.effect: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.

Strange Spoon.effect: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.

The Abacus.effect: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 6 Block.

Toolbox.effect: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards and add the chosen card into your hand.

Twisted Funnel.effect: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.

Bloody Idol.effect: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.

Enchiridion.effect: At the start of each combat, add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 for that turn.

Face Of Cleric.effect: At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by 1.

Mutagenic Strength.effect: Start each combat with 3 Strength. At the end of your first turn, lose 3 Strength.

N'loth's Gift.effect: Triple the chance of finding Rare cards from combat rewards.

N'loth's Hungry Face.effect: The next non-Boss chest you open is empty.

Necronomicon.effect: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. Upon pickup, obtain a special Curse.

Neow's Lament.effect: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.

Nilry's Codex.effect: At the end of your turn, you may shuffle 1 of 3 random cards into your draw pile.

Odd Mushroom.effect: When Vulnerable, take 25% more attack damage rather than 50%.

Red Mask.effect: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

Ssserpent Head.effect: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold.

Warped Tongs.effect: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
